data.comment: The match has been interrupted.
The match is underway in Antwerp.
Throw-in for Beerschot in the half of Zulte.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Beerschot.
Bert Put signals a Beerschot throw-in in Zulte's half.
Zulte pushes forward through Gianni Bruno, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 3, Can Zulte get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Beerschot's half?
Throw-in for Beerschot at Olympisch Stadion.
Tarik Tissoudali of Beerschot gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Zulte at Olympisch Stadion.
Beerschot have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Zulte in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Zulte close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Beerschot goal kick.
Bert Put awards Zulte a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Beerschot to take a throw-in in Zulte territory.
Free kick for Beerschot in the half of Zulte.
Zulte awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, In Antwerp Zulte attack through Gianni Bruno. The finish is off target, however.
Beerschot have a goal kick.
Marius Noubissi of Beerschot is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Zulte is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Zulte in Antwerp.
Beerschot needs to be cautious. Zulte have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 16, Zulte have been awarded a corner by Bert Put.
Beerschot awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Beerschot in their own half.
In the minute 17, Beerschot's Marius Noubissi misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Antwerp.
Corner awarded to Zulte.
In the minute 22, Marius Noubissi for Beerschot gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Zulte goal kick.
Throw-in for Zulte in their own half.
In the minute 23, Bert Put awards the home team a throw-in.
Bert Put awards Zulte a goal kick.
Free kick for Beerschot in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Zulte is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yan Vorogovskiy (Beerschot) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 29, Zulte have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Beerschot in their own half.
Free kick Zulte.
In the minute 30, Beerschot to take a throw-in in Zulte territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Antwerp.
Goal! Tarik Tissoudali gives Beerschot a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 32, That's a fine assist from Raphael Holzhauser.
Can Zulte get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Beerschot's half?
Bert Put signals a free kick to Zulte in their own half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Beerschot in the half of Zulte.
Can Beerschot capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Zulte's half?
Pierre Bourdin for Beerschot is whistled offside.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Beerschot at Olympisch Stadion.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Beerschot awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Omar Govea is replacing Mikael Soisalo for Zulte at Olympisch Stadion.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Beerschot.
Tarik Tissoudali (Beerschot) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 42, Beerschot's Marius Noubissi breaks free at Olympisch Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Zulte goal kick.
Zulte awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, In Antwerp a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Zulte's Jelle Vossen is whistled for offside at Olympisch Stadion.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Beerschot.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Beerschot drives forward and Denis Prychynenko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Beerschot have been awarded a corner by Bert Put.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Zulte.
Zulte awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Olympisch Stadion.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Antwerp.
Zulte drive forward but Jelle Vossen is judged offside.
Bert Put signals a Beerschot throw-in in Zulte's half.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Zulte at Olympisch Stadion.
Throw-in for Zulte at Olympisch Stadion.
Gianni Bruno (Zulte) strikes at Olympisch Stadion but his header is cleared.
In the minute 50, Marius Noubissi of Beerschot is pulled up for offside.
Bert Put awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Zulte at Olympisch Stadion.
In the minute 53, Bert Put awards Beerschot a goal kick.
Beerschot to take a throw-in in Zulte territory.
Corner awarded to Beerschot.
In the minute 56, Ryan Sanusi (Beerschot) gets a yellow card.
Bert Put signals a Zulte throw-in in Beerschot's half.
Goal! Zulte go level at 1-1 through Saido Berahino in Antwerp.
In the minute 57, Jelle Vossen instrumental with a fine assist.
Beerschot have been awarded a corner by Bert Put.
Throw-in for Beerschot in the half of Zulte.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Antwerp.
Beerschot awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Beerschot in their own half.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Zulte.
Can Zulte get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Beerschot's half?
In the minute 62, Bert Put signals a free kick to Beerschot in their own half.
In Antwerp a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Beerschot.
In the minute 64, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bassem Srarfi.
Zulte's Bassem Srarfi is back in action after a slight knock.
Bassem Srarfi (Zulte) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Zulte in the half of Beerschot.
Saido Berahino gets his shot on target but fails to score for Zulte.
Free kick for Beerschot in the half of Zulte.
In the minute 67, Omar Govea (Zulte) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Olympisch Stadion, Pierre Bourdin has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Raphael Holzhauser.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Zulte.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Denis Prychynenko for Beerschot who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ball safe as Zulte is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Zulte to take a throw-in in Beerschot territory.
In the minute 75, Denis Prychynenko (Beerschot) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Dario Van Den Buijs.
In the minute 76, Bert Put awards the away team a throw-in.
The away team have replaced Gianni Bruno with Jean-Luc Dompe. This is the second substitution made today by Francky Dury.
Bert Put signals a Beerschot throw-in in Zulte's half.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bert Put signals a throw-in for Beerschot, close to Zulte's area.
Beerschot have been awarded a corner by Bert Put.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Zulte in their own half.
Can Beerschot get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Zulte's half?
Zulte have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Zulte to take a throw-in in Beerschot territory.
Throw-in for Beerschot in their own half.
Zulte have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Beerschot's Marius Noubissi is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Zulte.
Throw-in for Zulte at Olympisch Stadion.
In the minute 83, Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a second substitution, with Blessing Eleke replacing Tarik Tissoudali.
Bert Put awards Beerschot a goal kick.
Idrissa Sylla is replacing Abdoulaye Sissako for the away team.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Zulte.
Can Zulte get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Beerschot's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Antwerp.
In the minute 87, Beerschot take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Raphael Holzhauser.
Great play from Marius Noubissi to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Beerschot in the half of Zulte.
In Antwerp Beerschot drive forward through Ryan Sanusi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Zulte needs to be cautious. Beerschot have an attacking throw-in.
Zulte awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Zulte are coming forward and Omar Govea gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Beerschot at Olympisch Stadion.
Ball safe as Zulte is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Hernan Losada is making the team's third substitution at Olympisch Stadion with Loris Brogno replacing Raphael Holzhauser.
Blessing Eleke for Beerschot has been booked by Bert Put and receives a first yellow card.
